div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 997 Nymphaeum (mod. Geroevka, for- merly Ėl'tigen), S of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1949 Burial: after 475 B.C. (Shelov) Contents: 17 AR. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: 1 diobol. (as Minns, pl. 5, 3-5) 16 fr. (same types, 0.18- 0.45 gm.) Disposition: Leningrad † Skudnova, VDI 1950, no. 4, pp. 78-9 Shelov, VDI 1951, no.1, pp. 263-4
